column5: Hey just wondering if the tribs out east are locked up? Planning at starting at port hope and making my way back west. Any info would be great feel free to pm me. Thanks

Can't help with anything other then Oshawa Creek, as I drive over the south end EVERYDAY on the way to work. The bottom end never blew out...still lotsa ice. Other then that i can't help you....I'm still in ice fishing mode on Simcoe.  Come on all you steelheaders who have been out...help this guy out !!!!
I know Oshawa and Duffins (above Bailey) are both completely open, so I can only assume creeks like Farewell, Bowmanville, Wilmot etc are all open as well.
